name: gzcrng

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cgz), ccrg), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(cgz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((CCfld[|`s]Z[i])∈ CRing, CCfld ∈ CRing, Z[i]∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cgz), ccrg)
-| wcel(ccnfld, ccrg)
-| wcel(cgz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))
-| wi(wa(wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(cgz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cgz), ccrg))
body.pretty:
⊢ (CCfld[|`s]Z[i])∈ CRing
⊣ CCfld ∈ CRing
⊣ Z[i]∈(SubRing ` CCfld)
⊣ ((CCfld ∈ CRing ∧ Z[i]∈(SubRing ` CCfld))→(CCfld[|`s]Z[i])∈ CRing)
